name: Miro MCP Tool Confusion Pairs
description: Tests for distinguishing between commonly confused Miro tools

pairs.distinction: list_boards returns all accessible boards; find_board searches by name/query

tests.prompt: Show me all my boards
tests.rationale: User wants to see all boards, not search for a specific one

tests.prompt: Find the board named Sprint Planning
tests.rationale: User wants to search for a specific board by name

tests.prompt: What boards do I have?
tests.rationale: General listing request, not a search

tests.prompt: Is there a board called Retro?
tests.rationale: Looking for a specific board by name

pairs.distinction: get_board returns metadata (name, owner, dates); get_board_summary returns content overview (item counts, types)

tests.prompt: Who owns this board?
What's on this board?
When was this board created?
How many sticky notes are on the board?

pairs.distinction: list_items returns paginated basic info; list_all_items returns all items with full details

tests.prompt: Show me the first 50 items on the board
Get all items with their full details
List items on the board
Export all board contents with positions

pairs.distinction: create_sticky makes one note; create_sticky_grid makes multiple in a grid layout

tests.prompt: Add a sticky note saying 'To Do'
Create 9 sticky notes in a 3x3 grid for brainstorming
Put a post-it with the action item
Set up a sticky wall with different colors

pairs.distinction: update_item moves/resizes any item; update_sticky changes sticky-specific properties (content, color)

tests.prompt: Move this sticky to position 100, 200
tests.rationale: Position change works for any item type

tests.prompt: Change the sticky note color to blue
Resize this sticky note
tests.rationale: Size change works for any item type

tests.prompt: Update the text on this sticky

pairs.distinction: frame is a visual container with background; group is an invisible logical grouping

tests.prompt: Create a section called 'Week 1' to organize items
Group these selected items together
Add a frame with a blue background
Lock these items so they move together

pairs.distinction: attach_tag adds existing tag to item; create_tag creates new tag definition

tests.prompt: Add the 'Urgent' tag to this sticky
Create a new tag called 'Priority'
Tag this item as 'Done'
Set up tags for status tracking

pairs.distinction: delete_item removes one item; bulk_delete removes multiple items at once

tests.prompt: Delete this sticky note
Remove all items in this frame
Get rid of this shape
Clear everything on the board

pairs.distinction: search_board finds items by content/query; list_items returns all items paginated

tests.prompt: Find all items containing 'action'
Show me all items on the board
Where are the TODO items?
Get the first 20 items

pairs.distinction: get_board_picture returns instant preview image; create_export_job starts async high-quality export

tests.prompt: Get a quick preview of the board
Export the board as high-resolution PDF
Show me what the board looks like
Create a print-ready export

pairs.distinction: create_card makes standard Miro card; create_app_card makes app-specific card with custom fields

tests.prompt: Create a card with title and description
Create a Jira-linked app card
Add a simple card to the board
Create a card with custom status field
